parameters.name: Category
parameters.description: > This parameter will be deprecated in the future. We recommend that you use other parameters to ensure future compatibility.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Page starts from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 100.

Default value: 50.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource to which the tags are added. If the resource is an instance, the value of this parameter is the ID of the instance.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource to which the tags are added. Valid values:

*   instance: Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.
*   disk: disk.
*   snapshot: snapshot.
*   image: image.
*   securitygroup: security group.
*   volume: storage volume.
*   eni: elastic network interface (ENI).
*   ddh: dedicated host.
*   keypair: SSH key pair.
*   launchtemplate: launch template.
*   reservedinstance: reserved instance.
*   snapshotpolicy: automatic snapshot policy.

All values must be in lowercase letters.
